entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:39 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 08:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
